source_file: Inbox/Transcripts/2025-01-15 10 00 - Weekly Sync with Jeff Denworth.md
title: Weekly Sync
summary: Discussed Google deal status (final contract review, closing EOW), enterprise pricing at $50k/month, and Walmart presentation prep. Decision to delay OVA 2.0 to Q2 to align with GDC launch.

tasks.description: Follow up with Google procurement team on professional services
Send updated deck for Walmart presentation to Jeff
Update roadmap doc for OVA 2.0 Q2 timeline

decisions: Delay OVA 2.0 release to Q2 to align with GDC launch
facts: Google deal in final contract review, expected to close EOW
